attributes.action: (i) That the UK Government fully supports Article 1 of The Universal Declaration of Human Rights1948 and that all citizens have a right to be treated with dignity. ii)  that this right is pivotal in all uk legislation and is applied retrospectively to existing legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
(i) that the uk government fully supports article 1 of the universal declaration of human rights1948 and that all citizens have a right to be treated with dignity.
and
ii)  that this right is pivotal in all uk legislation and is applied retrospectively to existing legislation.
